NiftiDataLoaderPiece.name: NiftiDataLoaderPiece
NiftiDataLoaderPiece.title: NIfTI Data Loader
NiftiDataLoaderPiece.description: Discovers and loads NIfTI medical imaging data (.nii.gz files). Pairs images with corresponding segmentation masks based on filename matching.

input_schema.description: NIfTI Data Loader Piece Input Model

images_path.description: Path to the directory containing NIfTI image files (.nii.gz)
images_path.title: Images Path

masks_path.description: Path to the directory containing NIfTI mask/segmentation files (.nii.gz). Optional for inference-only mode.
masks_path.title: Masks Path

file_pattern.description: Glob pattern to match NIfTI files (e.g., 'sub-*.nii.gz')
file_pattern.title: File Pattern

input_schema.title: InputModel

output_schema.description: NIfTI Data Loader Piece Output Model

subjects.description: List of discovered subjects with their image and mask paths
subjects.title: Subjects

output_schema.title: OutputModel

NiftiVisualizationPiece.name: NiftiVisualizationPiece
NiftiVisualizationPiece.description: Visualizes NIfTI medical imaging data with optional mask overlay in axial, sagittal, or coronal planes

input_schema.description:
NIfTI Visualization Piece Input Model

Standalone piece that loads NIfTI files directly from directories
and creates a grid visualization. No upstream connection required.

images_path.description: Path to directory containing NIfTI image files (.nii.gz)
images_path.title: Images Path

masks_path.description: Path to directory containing NIfTI mask files (.nii.gz). Optional.
masks_path.title: Masks Path

file_pattern.description: Glob pattern to match NIfTI files (e.g., '*.nii.gz')
file_pattern.title: File Pattern

max_subjects.description: Maximum number of subjects to visualize
max_subjects.title: Max Subjects

slice_index.description: Slice index to visualize. If None, uses middle slice.
slice_index.title: Slice Index

show_mask_overlay.description: Whether to overlay mask on image
show_mask_overlay.title: Show Mask Overlay

mask_alpha.description: Transparency of mask overlay (0.0 = transparent, 1.0 = opaque)
mask_alpha.title: Mask Alpha

input_schema.title: InputModel

subject_ids.description: List of subject IDs that were visualized
subject_ids.title: Subject Ids

ModelInferencePiece.name: ModelInferencePiece
ModelInferencePiece.description: Loads trained segmentation models and performs inference on samples with confidence visualization and detailed metrics

SubjectInfo.description: Information about a single subject for inference
SubjectInfo.title: SubjectInfo

model_path.description: Path to the trained model (.pth file)
model_path.title: Model Path

patch_size.description: Size of 3D patches used during training
patch_size.title: Patch Size

subjects.description: List of subjects from upstream piece. If provided, image_paths and mask_paths are ignored.
subjects.title: Subjects

image_paths.description: List of paths to NIfTI image files for inference
image_paths.title: Image Paths

mask_paths.description: Optional list of paths to ground truth masks for metric calculation
mask_paths.title: Mask Paths

num_samples.description: Number of samples to run inference on (0 = all)
num_samples.title: Num Samples

samples_per_volume.description: Number of patches to extract per volume
samples_per_volume.title: Samples Per Volume

output_dir.description: Directory to save inference results and visualizations
output_dir.title: Output Dir

save_predictions.description: Whether to save prediction masks as NIfTI files
save_predictions.title: Save Predictions

use_gpu.description: Whether to use GPU if available
use_gpu.title: Use Gpu

InferenceMetrics.description: Metrics for a single inference sample
InferenceMetrics.title: InferenceMetrics

mean_dice_score.description: Average Dice score across all samples (if masks provided)
mean_dice_score.title: Mean Dice Score

mean_confidence.description: Average confidence score across all samples
mean_confidence.title: Mean Confidence

ModelTrainingPiece.name: ModelTrainingPiece
ModelTrainingPiece.description: Trains 3D medical image segmentation models (UNet/SwinUNETR) with patch-based training, data augmentation, and runs inference with confidence visualization

SubjectInfo.description: Information about a single subject - compatible with upstream pieces
SubjectInfo.title: SubjectInfo

subjects.description: List of subjects from upstream piece (e.g., NiftiDataLoaderPiece, PituitaryDatasetPiece). If provided, dataset_config_path is ignored.
subjects.title: Subjects

dataset_config_path.description: Path to dataset_config.json generated by PituitaryDatasetPiece. Used only if subjects is None.
dataset_config_path.title: Dataset Config Path

data_root.description: Root directory containing images and masks subdirectories (used when loading from config file)
data_root.title: Data Root

train_val_split.description: Train/validation split ratio when using subjects input (0.0-1.0). E.g., 0.8 means 80% train, 20% val.
train_val_split.title: Train Val Split

output_dir.description: Directory to save trained models and training logs
output_dir.title: Output Dir

patch_size.description: Size of 3D patches to extract (cubic patches)
patch_size.title: Patch Size

samples_per_volume.description: Number of patches to sample per volume per epoch
samples_per_volume.title: Samples Per Volume

use_augmentation.description: Whether to apply data augmentation during training
use_augmentation.title: Use Augmentation

class_weights.description: Class weights for loss function (length must match num_classes). If None, uses default weights.
class_weights.title: Class Weights

early_stopping_patience.description: Number of epochs with no improvement before stopping (0 = disabled)
early_stopping_patience.title: Early Stopping Patience

eval_interval.description: Evaluate on validation set every N epochs
eval_interval.title: Eval Interval

save_checkpoint_interval.description: Save model checkpoint every N epochs
save_checkpoint_interval.title: Save Checkpoint Interval

num_workers.description: Number of data loader workers (set to 0 to avoid Docker shared memory issues)
num_workers.title: Num Workers

use_gpu.description: Whether to use GPU if available
use_gpu.title: Use Gpu

SubjectInfo.description: Information about a single subject - compatible with upstream pieces
SubjectInfo.title: SubjectInfo

TrainingMetrics.description: Training metrics for a single epoch
TrainingMetrics.title: TrainingMetrics

model_path.description: Path to the saved trained model
model_path.title: Model Path

best_model_path.description: Path to the best model (highest validation Dice)
best_model_path.title: Best Model Path

best_epoch.description: Epoch number where best validation Dice was achieved
best_epoch.title: Best Epoch

validation_subjects.description: List of validation subjects for downstream inference
validation_subjects.title: Validation Subjects

num_classes.description: Number of classes used in training (for inference configuration)
num_classes.title: Num Classes

patch_size.description: Patch size used in training (for inference configuration)
patch_size.title: Patch Size

HelloWorldPiece.name: HelloWorldPiece
HelloWorldPiece.title: Hello World Piece
HelloWorldPiece.description: A simple piece that generates greeting messages.

DataSplitPiece.name: DataSplitPiece
DataSplitPiece.title: Data Split
DataSplitPiece.description: Splits dataset subjects into train/validation/test sets with configurable ratios. Supports random and sequential splitting strategies.

subjects.description: List of subjects to split (from NiftiDataLoaderPiece)
subjects.title: Subjects

test_ratio.description: Proportion of data for testing (0.0-1.0). If not specified, uses remaining data.
test_ratio.title: Test Ratio

split_strategy.description: Strategy for splitting: 'random' shuffles data, 'sequential' keeps order

NiftiPreprocessingPiece.name: NiftiPreprocessingPiece
NiftiPreprocessingPiece.title: NIfTI Preprocessing
NiftiPreprocessingPiece.description: Preprocesses NIfTI medical imaging data with normalization (z-score, min-max, percentile), optional resizing, and conversion to NumPy format for efficient ML training.

lower_percentile.description: Lower percentile for clipping (used with 'percentile' normalization)
lower_percentile.title: Lower Percentile

upper_percentile.description: Upper percentile for clipping (used with 'percentile' normalization)
upper_percentile.title: Upper Percentile

save_as_numpy.description: Save preprocessed data as NumPy arrays (.npy) for faster loading
save_as_numpy.title: Save As Numpy

target_shape.description: Target shape for resizing (e.g., [128, 128, 64]). None = keep original.
target_shape.title: Target Shape

preprocessed_subjects.description: List of preprocessed subjects with paths and statistics
preprocessed_subjects.title: Preprocessed Subjects

num_failed.description: Number of subjects that failed preprocessing
num_failed.title: Num Failed

PituitaryDatasetPiece.name: PituitaryDatasetPiece
PituitaryDatasetPiece.title: Pituitary Dataset Creator
PituitaryDatasetPiece.description: Creates PyTorch-compatible dataset configurations for pituitary gland segmentation. Generates dataset configs and provides code for creating DataLoaders.

dataset_config_path.description: Path to saved dataset configuration JSON file
dataset_config_path.title: Dataset Config Path

subjects.description: Combined list of all subjects for downstream pieces (e.g., ModelTrainingPiece)
subjects.title: Subjects

GenerativeShapesPiece.name: GenerativeShapesPiece
GenerativeShapesPiece.title: Generative Shapes Piece
GenerativeShapesPiece.description: Generates a PNG image containing simple geometric shapes (circles, squares, triangles).

NiftiEDAPiece.name: NiftiEDAPiece
NiftiEDAPiece.description: Performs comprehensive Exploratory Data Analysis (EDA) on NIfTI medical imaging datasets with visual graphs and statistics

output_dir.description: [DEPRECATED - ignored] Directory to save EDA visualizations and reports. Files are now automatically saved to Domino's tracked storage.
output_dir.title: Output Dir

max_subjects.description: Maximum number of subjects to analyze (for performance)
max_subjects.title: Max Subjects

generate_3d_plots.description: Whether to generate 3D volume visualizations (computationally expensive)
generate_3d_plots.title: Generate 3D Plots

num_sample_slices.description: Number of random slices to sample for intensity distribution analysis
num_sample_slices.title: Num Sample Slices

unique_shapes.description: Number of unique volume shapes found
unique_shapes.title: Unique Shapes

unique_spacings.description: Number of unique voxel spacing protocols
unique_spacings.title: Unique Spacings

num_classes.description: Number of unique classes in masks
num_classes.title: Num Classes

mean_lesion_coverage.description: Mean ratio of lesion voxels to total voxels
mean_lesion_coverage.title: Mean Lesion Coverage

std_intensity.description: Mean standard deviation across all volumes
std_intensity.title: Std Intensity

statistics.description: Summary statistics from the comprehensive analysis

report_path.description: Path to the generated EDA text report
report_path.title: Report Path

analysis_texts.description: Detailed Slovak text descriptions for each analysis section
analysis_texts.title: Analysis Texts
